ModMetaData.name: No More Mechanoid Raids
ModMetaData.author: piet-rian
ModMetaData.description:
(This description was created using Deepl.)
This mod was made in reference to "[KIR]No Mechanoid Raids". https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1557017785
Eliminates raids by mechanoids. It does not eliminate mechanoid factions.
Therefore, the mechanoids will still be in the ancient ruins. And the mecha clusters will fall if the quest is ordered.
